title: 加州橡树岭高中社会学实验课堂

action: Sit quietly at desk, observe classroom, and adjust uniform
thoughts: First day of the experiment. I should make sure my uniform is perfect and follow all the rules to make a good impression. The teacher seems strict and I want to earn good discipline points.
memory: Arrived at classroom for sociology experiment
Preparing to follow all rules carefully

action: Maintain proper posture while discreetly observing teacher's reactions
thoughts: I hope my whisper wasn't too loud. The teacher seems particularly strict today and I need to be careful not to lose any discipline points. I should focus on following all the rules perfectly.
memory: Whispered about teacher's strictness to neighbor
Concerned about maintaining good discipline standing

action: Maintain perfect posture and attentive gaze toward teacher to demonstrate compliance
thoughts: I shouldn't have whispered. The teacher is definitely watching me now. I need to show I'm fully compliant and focused to avoid losing discipline points. Social acceptance depends on following the rules perfectly.
memory: Feeling anxious about potential discipline point deduction

action: Maintain perfect posture and attentive focus on teacher while processing competition rules
thoughts: I need to be extra careful after getting caught whispering earlier. The teacher is still watching me. I should focus completely on understanding these competition rules to ensure my group does well and I don't lose any more discipline points.
memory: Determined to redeem myself after earlier whispering incident
Focusing intensely on competition rules to ensure group success
